definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: In the process of Sun Chao's research of crystal, he has produced porcelain typical of different dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 孙超研究结晶来由过程中，烧出的历代陶瓷。

sentences.english: These two who have true love marry and have the crystal of their love finally.
sentences.chinese: 这两个有情人终成眷属并且拥有了他们爱情的结晶。

sentences.english: The existence of large second phases is found to be beneficial to nucleation.
sentences.chinese: 粗大的第二相粒子对再结晶形核具有促进作用。

sentences.english: Honey crystallizes if kept too long.
The Raman spectrum of crystalline trichosanthin in powder form is stu-died.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道粉末状结晶天花粉蛋白的拉曼光谱。

sentences.english: Double diffusive convection during static crystallization was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了静态定向结晶过程中的双扩散对流现象。

sentences.english: Illustrated poetry is the artistic integration of Chinese poetry and painting .
sentences.chinese: 题画诗，是中国诗歌与中国绘画相互融合的艺术结晶。

sentences.english: If crystallization occurs, use water bath heating to dissolve it, which will not affect the performance of product.
sentences.chinese: 发生结晶时只需用水浴加热溶解，不影响使用效果。

sentences.english: The effect of ultrasonic wave on calcium sulfate crystallization is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超声对硫酸钙结晶过程的影响。

sentences.english: This progress is the product of hard work and ingenuity multiplied across billions of individual lives.
sentences.chinese: 这种进步是数十亿人勤奋努力和创新的结晶。

sentences.english: Shanghai culture is the outcome of melting the cultures of north, south, east and west.
sentences.chinese: 海派文化是南北东西文化交融的结晶。

sentences.english: The massecuite thus obtained is then separated into anhydrous crystals of maltitol and mother liquor by conventional separation methods.
sentences.chinese: 结晶糖膏用常规有分离设备分成麦芽糖醇晶体和母液。

sentences.english: It produces in the B. C. E. , is the human wisdom crystallization.
sentences.chinese: 它产生于公元前，是人类智慧的结晶。

sentences.english: The critical condition of its dynamic recrystallization has been established by linear regression.
sentences.chinese: 建立了试验用钢的动态再结晶临界条件回归方程。

sentences.english: It is just my wisdom and talent crystalized.
sentences.chinese: 那只是我才华和智慧的结晶。

sentences.english: Brush 3 coasts dispersing the crystals evenly.
sentences.chinese: 施釉三遍及均匀地遍布结晶体。

definition: to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
to be pregnant/to produce offspring/to nurture (a development, school of thought, artwork etc)/fig. replete with (culture etc)
